Admission Date :
01/22/2013
Discharge Date :
01/27/2013
HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS :
The patient is a 45-year-old woman who is chronic hepatitis B for ten years.
She complained extreme tiredness and suffered from loss of appetite.
In 01/23/2013, she had a CT scan which showed hepatocirrhosis.
HOSPITAL COURSE :
On the third hospital day , she did have some pain.
